type.description: Filter by topic type. If not provided, returns all types.

department.description: Department ID (ObjectId). If provided, returns topics from this department or general topics (department: null)

filters.event: Only shows events that haven't ended (endDate > now)
filters.scholarship: Only shows scholarships that haven't expired (applicationDeadline > now)
filters.notification: Only shows notifications that haven't expired (endDate > now or endDate is null)

response.total: Total number of topics matching the query

department.description: Filter by department ID. Coordinators can only see their own department topics.

getAllTopicsAdmin.note: Returns all topics including expired ones. Coordinators automatically filtered to their department.

403.message: Access denied. Admin or Coordinator role required.

response.data: Topic object with populated department and createdBy

department.description: Department ID (ObjectId). Null for general topics. Coordinators can only create for their own department.

messages: Invalid type. Allowed types: event, scholarship, notification, job, advertisement, internship, recruitment, volunteer, extracurricular
Start date and end date are required for events
End date must be after start date
Application deadline is required for scholarships

403.message: No permission to create topics for other departments

updateTopic.note: All fields are optional. Only provided fields will be updated. Coordinators can only update topics from their own department. Only Admin can change department.

400.message: End date must be after start date

messages: No permission to update topics from other departments
No permission to update general topics, only Admin has permission
No permission to change the department of the topic

deleteTopic.note: Coordinator can only delete topics from their own department. General topics can only be deleted by Admin. Automatically removes topic from all users' saved lists.

403.message: No permission to delete topics from other departments
403.or: No permission to delete general topics, only Admin has permission

saveTopic.note: Adds topic to user's saved topics list. If already saved, does nothing.

unsaveTopic.note: Removes topic from user's saved topics list.

getSavedTopics.note: Returns topics saved by the authenticated user. Sorted by saved order.

response.data: Array of saved topics with populated department and createdBy

commonFields.title: Title of the topic (required)
commonFields.type: Type of topic - must be one of: event, scholarship, notification, job, advertisement, internship, recruitment, volunteer, extracurricular (required)
commonFields.department: Department ID (ObjectId) - optional, null for general topics
commonFields.createdBy: User ID who created the topic (automatically set)

eventSpecificFields.endDate: Event end date and time (must be after startDate)
